testcase.name: Given I set up the LTI consumer key and shared secret if not already done
And I am logged in as the default administrator
And I create custom field mappings
And I directly log out
When I launch random "basic-lti-launch-request" LTI request with role "Administrator" and outcome URL "" and document target "window"
Then I am on the LTI Mapping Page
When I click the 'System Homepage' mapping button
Then I am on the System Homepage
When I open the Search User page
Then I search for and validate LTI user
And I verify and close the LTI Page window
Then I am on the Test Harness page
When I restore the launched LTI Test Harness form
And I update LTI user fields
And I set random value for "custom_mapped_email" email field
And I set random value for "custom_mapped_student_id" field
When I launch prepared "basic-lti-launch-request" LTI request with role "Instructor" and outcome URL "" and document target "window"
Then I am on the System Homepage
When I open the Search User page
Then I search for and validate LTI user
And I verify and close the LTI Page window
Then I am on the Test Harness page
When I close the LTI Test Harness leftover windows
And I directly log out
And I am logged in as the default administrator
And I am on the Field Mapping page
Then I delete all LTI field mappings.
classMethod
